thread.section_title: Independent Carpet One Westland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Independent Carpet One Westland | www.independentcarpetonewestland.com
thread.title: Karen Calleja
thread.title_full: Independent Carpet One Westland reviewed by Karen Calleja

author: Karen Calleja
title: Karen Calleja
text: All staff members are very friendly and helpful. Our sales rep Jan was very professional and helpful in aiding us make a decision on which floor to select for our kitchen. Joe who installed our floor did an excellent job and was very timely and professional. I would definitely recommend Independent Carpet One and will be back when it is time to replace our carpeting.
